https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mZOxN7pdBlfD9NROmFcCY6Yi9qL.jpg Vasudev Balwant Phadke's sacrifice rekindled the dying flames of the 1857 Uprising and he came to be worshipped as the foremost revolutionary of the nation. Watch the movie to find out how he fought against all odds. Ek Krantiveer: Vasudev Balwant Phadke
